oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Scrapbook of Sadie Priscilla Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Sadie Priscilla Jones attended Jackson High School and graduated in 1917. He future husband, Mike Glynn, departed for the Army June 23, 1917. Mike presented her with her class ring which is referenced in her scrapbook. Upon his return from service they married. The selections from her scrapbook often include references to World War I and provide a glimpse into life in Jackson, Tennessee during that era. She mentions attending a reception and a dearth of boys due to the war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
